Text: no subjectSara How nice to hear from you We did have a Maxwell Hendler exhibition and it was incredible I thought I sent Mike the review If not I should have Maxwell is currently in an exhibition in Verona Italy at Studio La Citta that has been very successful I still have TANGEE at my home AQUA POOL remains available and there are some new pieces as well We have had a terrific season Hurry Back Best regards Patty
